title: Vatrushka
ingredients: ['Pastry', '10g dried active baking yeast', '1 pinch caster sugar', '110ml warm milk', '250g plain flour', '50g butter, melted', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', 'Filling', '500g farmers cheese', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons soured cream or creme fraiche', '1 egg yolk for brushing']
